name: animeart-master
description: to make changes to this: 1. fork this repository(top right corner 2. go to your own github profile: github.com/username 3. go to repositories section 4. open this repository 5. navigate to the desired folder using "cd command" (contact me for details) 6. open git bash and write: git clone repository url(copy-paste it from the url bar) 7. now start working on it
